summary: Add type validation to Todo.rename() method to raise TypeError for non-string input

changes.description: Add isinstance check before calling strip() on text parameter
Add 3 new tests for non-string inputs (None, int, list)

tests_run: uv run ruff check src/flywheel/todo.py tests/test_minimal_framework.py
risks: This is a defensive validation addition with no breaking changes to existing behavior
